column5: A couple of things I like about this video.. is how many of the bass come out after the lure, plus how they all shy away right when they get out of their comfort zone just past the reef.  AND  does anyone know what those holes in the bottom are?  <object width="425" height="355"><param name="movie" value="

Cool video TJ !!!!!...i really like those underwater clips of fish  ,man i think i want a camera for sure...well i have seen and asked about those small holes before,  and i have been told that its shiners or mud-minnows foraging in the sand for food.??..then i was told they are suckers doing the same thing.??...im not sure,but thanks for sharing i hope someone can figure it out once and for all....cheers
Cool video.  Mean of you though, as I have to wait 6 months before I can fish for bass again  . You'd think with all those bass chasing, one would take a hit.
